description: Creates a new generic NgModule definition in the given or default project.
title: Angular Module Options Schema

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the NgModule?

___routingScope.description: The scope for the new routing module.

___lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the module.

___commonModule.description: When true, the new NgModule imports "CommonModule".

___routing.description: When true, creates a routing module.

___flat.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project root.

___path.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the workspace root.
